title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Mobile Microlearning Design Based on Learning Objects for Mathematics Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics and experience with mobile device utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify at least three core modules applicable to mathematical problem-solving by analyzing learning objects (LOs).

Learners will apply a knowledge succession process (requirements analysis → content decomposition → microlearning structuring) to reorganize ≥2 of 3 existing instructional design elements. They will develop two 10-minute microlearning contents (1 video, 1 interactive quiz) and meet internal criteria (content completeness ≥80%, learning efficacy ≥75%).
Achieve a completion rate of 85% or higher in collaborative projects with peer learners by applying learning design reuse principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
